05542.mean:
in order to; for.

मा, लाई, का लागि, निम्ति ।

05543.mean:
[Phedape] a prepositional/postpositional particle or suffix meaning ‘without’, ‘except’, ‘besides’, ‘deprived of’, ‘lacking’ etc.

[फेदापे] सर्वनाम वा नाम पछाडि जोडिएर ‘विना’, ‘रहित’, ‘नभइ’, ‘नभइकन’ आदि अर्थ बुझाउने निपात ।

05544.mean:
to be fat; to become fat; to fatten; to gain weight.

मोटाउनु ।

05546.mean:
a kind of malarial tree (a variety of malarial Xanthoxylum hamiltonianum).

औले टिम्मुर ।

05547.mean:
1. (of family, tribe, race, species, animals, etc) become extinct; to die out; to be finished. 2. exhaust; to run short; to run out of supply (of sth).

१. (जाति, वंश, पशु, आदि) नाश हुनु; निर्मुल हुनु । २, सिद्धिनु; सकिनु; कुनै पनि प्रकारको सामाग्री सकिनु ।

05549.mean:
1. to complete/accomplish/carry out fully. 2. to finish/do away with.

१. सबै वा जम्मै टाकटुक सक्नु; सिद्ध्याउनु । २. सक्नु; सिद्ध्याउनु; निमिट्यान्न पार्नु ।

05551.mean:
1. to take control over sth; to take sth unauthoritatively into one’s possession. 2. to help/serve oneself. 3. to have a mutual talk; to have an exchange of talk.

१. आफ्नो पार्नु; (अर्काको चिज वस्तु) कब्जा गर्नु । २. आफ्नो लागि कुनै काम/सेवा आफै गर्नु । ३. परस्परमा कुरा आदानप्रदान गर्नु ।

05552.mean:
1. value; cost; price. 2. a sentence particle denoting “if, then”.

१. मूल्य; मोल; दाम । २. “नि, त, ता, तै, यदि” आदि वाक्यांशको अन्तमा आउने अनिसश्चयबोधक निपात शब्द ।

05553.mean:
pubic hair of the vagina; secret hair on the female organ; pubes of the vagina.

योनिको रौं; जाँठो (स्त्री) ।

05557.mean:
1. human-being; man. 2. the first man of creation.

१. मानव; मान्छे; मानिस । २. सृष्टिको प्रथम पुरुष ।

05558.mean:
in a manner of haste/doing one’s utmost.

भ्याइनभ्याई; व्यस्ततापूर्वक; हतारहतार गर्ने चालाले ।

05563.mean:
1. incapable. 2. incompetent; unqualified.

१. अशक्त; असमर्थ । २. अयोग्य ।

05567.mean:
1. a row/bevy/swarm of young woman/ladies. 2. females who wait on/escort the bride upto the groom’s house. 3. the constellation of the Great Bear, the pleiades. 4. a group of stars often visible in the morning beside the constellation of three stars.

१. तरुनीको लहर/ताँती । २. लोकन्ती; बेहुलीलाई पुर्याउन जाने स्वास्नीमानिस । ३. सप्तर्षि तारा; कृत्तिका । ४. तीनआँख्ले तारासँगै अक्सर बिहानीपख गुजमुज्ज परेर रहने ताराहरुको समूह ।

05568.mean:
1. name of a high hill in the Milke Mountain Range in eastern Nepal. 2. one of the hill in the Milke Range, mentioned in the Mundhum.

१. पूर्वी नेपालको मिल्के पहाड शृङ्खलाको एक उच्च डाँडाको नाम । २. मिल्के पहाड शृङ्खलामा अवस्थित मुन्धुममा वर्णित एक पहाड ।

05569.mean:
1. indeclinable, a polite word expressing humbleness denoting the sense of ‘at any rate’, ‘in any case’, ‘anyhow’, ‘even though’, ‘despite’, ‘knowingly or unknowingly’, ‘so so’ etc. 2. so so, simple; ordinary. 3. (even though) humbly; very simple; so-so.

१. केहि कुरा अर्पण वा जाहेर गर्दा प्रसङ्गअनुसार ‘जे जस्तो भएपनि’, ‘नमिठो भएपनि’, ‘नराम्रो भएपनि’, ‘जानी नजानी’, ‘भए वा नभएपनि’ आदि विभिन्न अर्थ वहन गरी विनम्रता प्रकट गर्ने शब्द । २. साधारण । ३. अति सामान्य; यस्ते उस्तै (भएपनि) ।

05570.mean:
1. matchless. 2. unique; unparalleled.

१. विजोडी; बेजोडा । २. अद्वितीय; बेजोड ।

05572.mean:
1. unsociable; not congenial; queer; eccentric. 2. different; separate; incomparable.

१. कसैसित मिल्न नसक्ने; अडभङ्गे; अमिल्दो । २. बेग्लै; फरक; पृथक ।

05573.mean:
a lot of; a large number of; many; excessive; innumerable.

असङ्ख्य; धेरै; अत्यन्त; कता हो कता ।

05574.mean:
1. to tell/relate/narrate. 2. auxiliary/helping verb suffixed to another word to denote ‘to do sth’, ‘to impress or to be impressed’.

१. भन्नु; सुनाउनु । २. अन्य शब्दको पछिल्तिर जोडिएर ‘केहि गर्नु’, ‘प्रभावित पार्नु/हुनु’ आदि अर्थ बोध गराउने सहायक क्रिया ।

05581.mean:
to perform the final marriage-ritual to transfer a woman to her husband’s clan from her paternal clan.

साइमुन्द्रीको रीति सम्पन्न गर्ने ।

05583.mean:
1. a kind of white crested bird which flies in group (a kind of Bulbul). 2. (of wheat, plant, weed, etc) to topple over; ot cuddle; to fall down. 3. (of goat, kids) to bleat.

१. एक प्रकारको बगालमा हुने (जुरेली) चरा । २. गहुँ, झार आदि ढल्नु । ३. बोका बाख्रा कराउनु; म्याम्या गर्नु ।

05584.mean:
or; otherwise; if not; or else; if.

नत्र (भने); अन्यथा; यदि ।

05585.mean:
to fell/topple over; to get the bushes, etc depress by walking/treading upon them; to press sth; to tread over sth.

धानकोदो झार आदि ढाल्नु; माडमुड पार्नु; दलदाल पार्नु ।

05587.mean:
1. ‘non not’, a negative particle when affixed before or after a verb gives a negative meaning. 2. no; not.

१. हुनु क्रियालाई नकारात्मक बनाउन क्रियापदको अगाडि पछाडि जोडिने निपात । २. नाइँ; अहँ ।

05592.mean:
(n.) imperfection; not full. (adv.) imperfectly; not fully.

(ना.) अपूर्णता; अपूर्णत्व । (क्रिवि.) अपूर्ण रूपले; भरि नहुने गरेर ।

05593.mean:
[Phedape] ‘no, not’, a negative particle; one of the negative forms of the verb ‘to be’.

[फेदापे] ‘होइन’; ‘हुनु’ क्रियाको नकारार्थी भाव बुझाउने शब्द ।

05594.mean:
1. unfathomable; unapproachable; unattainable; unknowable; inaccessible. 2. devoid of quality.

१. अगम; गम पाइ नसक्नु; जानि नसक्नु । २. निर्गुण ।

05596.mean:
suddenly; abruptly; all of a sudden.

अकस्मात; अचानक ।

05600.mean:
a prepositional suffix meaning ‘without’, ‘not having’, ‘lacking’.

नामको पछाडि जोडिएर ‘विना’, ‘रहित’, ‘नभई’ आदि अर्थ बुझाउने शब्द ।

05602.mean:
a bit; a little; few; a little bit; scanty.

थोरै; अलिकति ।

05603.mean:
a village named Myalung in Limbu; one of villages in distant Far Kinant region, described in the Limbu legends and at present is the headquarter of Terhathum districh (east Nepal).

लिम्बू पौराणिक आख्यनमा वर्णित, हाल तेह्रथुम जिल्लाको सदरमुकाममा पर्ने, पल्लो किराँतको एक गाउँको नाम ।
